actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife and Oceans.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife, and Oceans

official_title: To amend the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Authorization Act of 1992 to revise and enhance authorities, and to authorize appropriations, for the Chesapeake Bay Office, and for other purposes.
short_title: NOAA Chesapeake Bay Office Improvement Act
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control
Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: NOAA Chesapeake Bay Office Improvement Act - Amends the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Authorization Act of 1992 to: (1) rename the Chesapeake Bay Estuarine Resources Office as the Chesapeake Bay Office (the Office); (2) revise the functions of the Office; (3) require a five-year study concerning living resources of the Chesapeake Bay and a multiple species management strategy for the Chesapeake Bay; (4) require a community-based fishery and habitat restoration small grants and technical assistance program in the Chesapeake Bay watershed; and (5) authorize appropriations for the Office through FY 2004.

titles.title: NOAA Chesapeake Bay Office Improvement Act

To amend the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Authorization Act of 1992 to revise and enhance authorities, and to authorize appropriations, for the Chesapeake Bay Office, and for other purposes.
